1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Gunner tries adjusting to single life. Max butts heads on the set of his short film with an inept cinematographer and a highly medicated actress. Chas ignores responsibilities and phone calls from his father.

2.title: Welcome to Letdown City
2.plot: Gunner fails to connect with Du'Quon, a new talent at the theatre. The Talents spend their day debating films.

3.title: Fate Fucked Me in a Parking Lot
3.plot: After a run in with an old high school friend, Max begins to question his current circumstances.

4.title: The Plan
4.plot: Chas has a pivotal lunch with his father, who has just been released from rehab. A one night stand with Alison becomes something more.

5.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
5.plot: Gunner has an awkward date with Rebecca. Tiffany tries to broaden Gunner's horizons. Gunner has a bizarre encounter with an undercover police officer.

6.title: Malcolm
6.plot: Max pays a visit to his old writing partner and discovers a disturbing home life.

7.title: Emilie
7.plot: Emilie has a one night stand with Noah. Her relationship with Max escalates.

8.title: Give Up
8.plot: Chas gets career advice from his drug dealer, Edmond, before interviewing with a door to door Christian rock group.

9.title: The Protector
9.plot: After another quarter of low ticket sales, the theatre faces an unlikely future. Gunner has a date with Tiffany. Ken Jost's origins are explored.

10.title: A Person To You
10.plot: Max faces reality as the future of his short film becomes clear. Emilie and Max's relationship grows deeper. Chas moves back home and makes amends with his father and Alison. Max and Chas' friendship is tested.

imdb.plot outline: Max Brenner has been working at Playhouse Cinemas for longer than he'd care to admit. He's in a stable relationship and is currently tinkering with his long-gestating passion project - a short film whose subject has escaped him - but his employment at the theatre, and the frustration it has caused him, remain a constant. Working alongside him is Gunner Dawson, a naive, optimistic man whose heart is reeling from a nasty divorce, but who will nevertheless not be discouraged. Max's relationship with his former best friend Chas - a once-promising child actor whose future vanished into a haze of pot smoke - is also at a crossroads. And then there's Emilie: the mysterious girl he keeps seeing on the subway during his daily commute. Over the course of ten episodes, these four interrelated characters will search for love, purpose and connection all set against the backdrop of an L.A. you don't often see in films or television. It's also a changing city: film has moved to digital and although many of the characters are holding on to tragedies and milestones from their pasts, it would appear that the world has moved on without them. Their fumbling quest for meaning in the world is emblematic of the myth-making in our own lives: how we view our own small problems as life-changing events, and how we often see ourselves as "the stars of our own movies". "Talents" is the story of love lost and found again, the power of dreams and coming of age, no matter how old you are.
imdb.title: Talents
plot: A darkly comedic series focusing on the employees of a dying art house movie theatre, all in search of love, purpose and connection.::_Talents_ (qv)

And then there's Emilie: the mysterious girl he keeps seeing on the subway during his daily commute. Over the course of ten episodes, these four interrelated characters will search for love, purpose and connection all set against the backdrop of an L.A. you don't often see in films or television. It's also a changing city: film has moved to digital and although many of the characters are holding on to tragedies and milestones from their pasts, it would appear that the world has moved on without them. Their fumbling quest for meaning in the world is emblematic of the myth-making in our own lives: how we view our own small problems as life-changing events, and how we often see ourselves as "the stars of our own movies". "_Talents_ (qv)" is the story of love lost and found again, the power of dreams and coming of age, no matter how old you are.::_Talents_ (qv)
